sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title,city, photo, price, featured, reviews} =tour; const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc + item.rating,0) const avgRating =totalRating === 0 ? '' : totalRating === 1 ? totalRating : totalRating /revie return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} {reviews.length}
{title}
{price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
